example.text: The debate on Puerto Rico's statehood deserves more than a last minute messaging bill that had no chance of even being voted on by the Senate. Such political antics are exactly what Americans loathe, but have been par for the course under Pelosi's reign.

Thanks [[user]] for unanimous & bipartisan support for my bill, the Block Grant Assistance Act, today! This bill will give [[user]] the authority to expedite disaster relief payments for our agricultural producers so Americans can continue to enjoy products grown here in America.

Susan recently called our Lakeland office requesting help with a claim she made after her package was irrevocably damaged in the mail. Thanks to the hard work of our caseworkers, we resolved her $200 claim.

The debate on Puerto Rico's statehood deserves more than a last minute messaging bill that had no chance of even being voted on by the Senate. Such political antics are exactly what Americans loathe, but have been par for the course under Pelosi's reign.

Hurricane Ian Disaster Relief is Available Those impacted by Hurricane Ian can apply for federal assistance from the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) and the Small Business Administration (SBA). Our office can help with the application process.

For more information on constituent services, current legislation, and to sign up for my e-newsletter, please visit my website at . Best regards, C Scott Franklin Member of Congress Franklin In the News Mayorkas, Wray to testify at Judiciary Key Twitter & Facebook Posts [[user]] It's troubling to learn China is looking to team up with Cuba to intercept American intelligence from Florida's backyard.

Fighting back against political antics Last week, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi brought the Puerto Rico Status Act to the House floor with less than 24 hours notice. There was virtually no to time to review it and even less to debate it.
